RelatedSentence: Imphal , May 19 2014 : As part of its measures to reform units and branches , All Manipur Students ' Union ( AMSU ) reconstituted AMSU Kakching Khunou Branch during a meeting held at the union 's head office on May 16 .

A0: a meeting held at the union 's head office on May 16
RelatedSentence: The meeting also elected Thingam Ramesh Singh as president , Angom Angousana Meitei as vice-president and Angom Jotin Singh as general secretary of the newly constituted branch .
